mean_cn: n. 绳结，结合，树的节；  v. 打结
mean_en: a join made by tying together two pieces or ends of string, rope, etc.; a hard round spot in a piece of wood where there was once a branch; a small group of people standing close together
sentence: In the Stone Age people tied knots in ropes to count.
sentence_trans: 在石器时代人们曾在绳子上打结来计数。
